name: reduced-dark-ui

uiScale.title: UI scale
uiScale.description: Scale the user interface (does not affect the text editor font size)

tabSizing.title: Spread tabs
tabSizing.description: Spread the tabs to fill the whole tab bar.

fixedTabBar.title: Fixed tab tar
fixedTabBar.description: Display tabs above everything else. Enabling this setting allows tabs to spread amongst the whole screen. **Has some issues while the screen is split horizontally**

fixedProjectRoot.title: Fixed project root
fixedProjectRoot.description: Set the project root(s) in the tree view to be fixed to the top of the view. If enabled, the root folders remain fixed to the top of the view while the tree view is scrolled.

collapsing.title: Collapsing panels
collapsing.description: Collapse the side panels. Panels are shown on mouseover.

primary.title: Primary color
primary.description: The primary highlight color. Used in the main GUI interaction

accentColor.title: Secondary color
accentColor.description: A complementary highlight accent, used mainly for hostile states' representation.

state.title: State colors
state.description: Colors for representing different states (such as git file events)

success.title: Success
success.description: New files in the repository, success messages, affirmative buttons

error.title: Error
error.description: Fatal errors, cancel actions, all that negative stuff

overrideEditorBackground.title: Override Editor Background Color
overrideEditorBackground.description: Instead of using the syntax theme's background color, force the Reduced Dark UI's background color to be used in the editor

uiFont.title: UI font family
uiFont.description: Font for the regular text in the UI

uiFontWeight.title: UI font weight
uiFontWeight.description: Font weight for the regular text in the UI

icons.title: Icons
icons.description: Icons for the workspace's panels (run reduced-dark-ui:decorate to refresh)

description: A dark & minimal yet usable theme for atom.
